text: avarkk nam cila kuttukare erpetutti keatuttu. ennitt a kuttalikal avarkk tannalute mumpilullatum pinnilullatum alankrtamayi teanniccu. jinnukalil ninnum manusyaril ninnum avarkk mump kalinnupeayittulla samudayannalute kuttattil ivarute melum (siksayeparriyulla) prakhyapanam sthirappetukayuntayi. tirccayayum avar nastam parriyavarayirunnu
